frontmatter.title: Enable Environment Injecton
frontmatter.description: Learn how to enable environment injection per Kubernetes namespace

children.value: The Env Injector is developed using a Mutating Admission Webhook that triggers just before every Pod gets created. To allow cluster administrators some control over which Pods this Webhook gets triggered for, it must be enabled per namespace using the
label, like in the example below:
